name: It's Bananas
description:
While you were on a lovely island cruise, someone stole all your bananas, and laid them out in a complicated dangerous path across the islands. Armed with only one coconut, you have got to get them back, or your holiday will be ruined! Honestly, it's bananas!

Ed & Ted need to toss their precious coconut back and forth to conquer every challenge in their way! Ed moves with WASD, and throws with E, Ted moves with IJKL and throws with U. If it looks like there's no way out, Ed & Ted can reverse time to try again using R.

Enjoy!
